title: Ep. #68 | Eric's New Album 'The Other Side'
description:
Special episode alert! Tune in as Eric dishes on his brand new mini album 'The Other Side' and what it was like writing music during quarantine. Don't forget to stream all five tracks on Spotify, iTunes, Google Play, or wherever you get your music! *Please note: This episode was recorded before Eric's album release.


This episode is brought to you by BetterHelp and Raycon! Visit betterhelp.com/kpop and http://buyraycon.com/kpop


Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.


Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios


Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !


SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios


#EricNam #에릭남 #TheOtherSide #ParadisewithEricNam #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios
